type1_missing.reasoning: Dashboard displays user's name but no API endpoint exists to fetch actual user data - code uses mock hardcoded 'User' name instead

Using error codes not listed in specification: MISSING_CREDENTIALS, INVALID_NAME, REGISTRATION_FAILED, LOGIN_FAILED, LOGOUT_FAILED, FETCH_FAILED, CREATE_FAILED, UPDATE_FAILED, DELETE_FAILED, INVALID_TITLE
